title: Kimberley Garner puts on a leggy display in a TINY cut-out dress and heels while walking her dog
text:
She never fails to turn heads with her daring red carpet displays.

And Kimberley Garner proved she can inject a touch of glamour to even the most mundane of daily chores as she walked her dog Sacha in Chelsea, London, on Wednesday.

The one-time Made In Chelsea star, 28, wore a racy mini-dress with a slash across the chest and ruched detailing.

Puppy love: Kimberley Garner proved she can inject a touch of glamour to even the most mundane of daily chores as she walked her dog Sacha in Chelsea, London, on Wednesday

The TV personality looked stunning in a pale green dress which had a ruffle on the left side.

The blonde beauty rocked statement puffed sleeves as she strutted past the The Ivy Chelsea Garden on the King's Road.

Kimberley accessorised her look with a tiny black top-handle bag and tan crocodile skin heels.

The swimwear designer completed her autumn ensemble with a pair of tortoiseshell sunglasses.

Stunning: The one-time Made In Chelsea star, 28, wore a racy mini-dress with a slash across the chest and ruched detailing

Work it: The TV personality looked stunning in a pale green dress which had a ruffle on the left side and an eye-wateringly short hem

Kimberley wore her straight blonde hair down and added a touch of neutral make-up.

Showcasing an eye for detail, the former MIC star matched her pet pooch's lead to the exact shade of her dress.

Things seem to be on the up for Kimberley in romantic terms; last month she appeared to confirm her reunion with her ex-boyfriend.

The couple were seen kissing and cuddling in a London park following their split last year.

Following their break-up, Kimberley told MailOnline: 'I ended the relationship recently. It was a really wonderful three years and we are still good friends today.'

The socialite has been notoriously tight-lipped about the identity of her long-term boyfriend.

Kimberley splits her time between London and Miami after purchasing a dream home in the coastal city in December 2018.

Speaking to MailOnline about her new home, she explained: 'I worked very hard last year and had even moved home for a few months to save money.

Strike a pose: Showcasing an eye for detail, the former MIC star matched her pet pooch's lead to the exact shade of her dress

'I really had my head down working to concentrate on goals, but achieved it on New Year’s Eve, praise God, and flew over here. Completed the sale on the plane over.'

Reflecting on her new property, the swimwear designer admitted it is a world away from the hustle and bustle of her busy life in London.

'It’s right on the beach, and really is a dream come true,' she explained. 'I am over doing the interior design, going for a beachy chilled vibe for the place.

'I won’t be moving there [permanently], as London is one hundred percent home, but really overjoyed and proud to have achieved it.'
